name: The Saluki Bot Foundation
tagline: Saluki is a discord bot account made up of small open-source codelets.
body:
### Welcome
The Saluki project is made up of open-source codelets ran at different times.

### About the codelets
these codelets have codenames like creepy (cree.py) but are open-source and lightweight making it easy to run on your computer.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
